ygData.subject: Re: Manifest Destiny
ygData.msgSnippet: Menasor pulled his hand with Slaughter in it out of the way, as the two pods shot by. He looked down at Stratus blankly. Megatron knew what he was thinking.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Menasor pulled his hand with Slaughter in it out of the way, as the two
pods shot by. He looked down at Stratus blankly.

Megatron knew what he was thinking. "No Menasor, that robot didnt attack
you." He said pointing to Stratus. "Hold that one for a little longer."
Megatron turned his attention to Stratus. "Excellent job Stratus, now I
have one where you will be the best. Depart with Astrotrain, he will
fill you in." Megatron looked up to Menasor. "Show him to me."

Menasor stood their staring at Slaughter, then lowered his hand to the
ground, so Slaughter's feet were dangling just above it, but he held his
iron clad grip. Megatron looked deep into Slaughter's eyes.

"So, who is foolish enough to enter the Decepticon headquarters?" He
asked.
